typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Emps/today/*.csv']) ~> EmpFile
source(output(
		maxval as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 12 as maxval from dbo.dimemp',
	format: 'query') ~> DimEmp
EmpFile keyGenerate(output(surrogatekey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
AlterRow1 derive(surrogatekey = toInteger(surrogatekey) + toInteger(maxval)) ~> AddSKtoMaxVal
DerivedColumn1 alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
SurrogateKey1 derive(column1 = surrogatekey + toInteger(sink2#outputs().maxval)) ~> DerivedColumn1
AddSKtoMaxVal sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
DimEmp sink(mapColumn(
		maxval
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['maxval'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink2
